text: "Single, my dear," said I, "I can not tell: so keen was it, and yet be undecided as to what it is precisely."

passages.full_quote: "If you like the service, well, you'll jine; and if you want to shew him any attention, <used>my dear," said I</used>
"Captain Pel<used>eg," said I, "I h</used>ave a friend with me who wants to ship too-shall I bring him down to-morrow?"
"Now," thou<used>ght I, "I can</used> perhaps get her to talk."
"my dear," cried his w<used>ife, "I can not</used> bear to hear that mentioned"
"<used>I can not tell: I</used> found her at the door," was the reply

passages.fragment: I can not tell : so keen was it , and yet
passages.full_quote: <used>I can not tell: so keen was it, and yet</used> so cold, I felt for the moment superstitious -- as if I were sitting in the room with something uncanny

passages.fragment: it , and yet be undecided as to what it is precisely
passages.full_quote: And as for this whale spout, you might almost stand <used>in it, and yet be undecided as to what it is precisely</used>
